text.en: Where should I go?

text.ko: 아줌마, 이분이 저희 아빠예요. 외모 괜찮지 않아요?
text.en: Ma'am, this is my dad. Doesn't he look nice?

text.ko: 두 분을 식당에서 만나게 할게요. 약속 장소에서 꼭 만나요.
text.en: I'll arrange for you two to meet at a restaurant. Please make sure to meet at the agreed location.
Chairman, are you really going on a blind date?
Well, I guess I have to meet them.
How should I meet them?
I should make a decision, right?
Oh? Excuse me.
Yes?
Let me borrow those clothes.
These clothes?
Hello, nice to meet you. Since this is a blind date, I'll be honest.
My name is Kim Hyunsoo, and I work as a janitor.
I earn about 200 a month. As you can see, my situation isn't very good.

text.ko: 월 200 정도 벌고 있고요. 보시다시피 사정이 별로 안 좋아요.
text.en: I earn about 200 a month. As you can see, my situation isn't very good.
Oh, I'm in a similar situation.

text.ko: 저는 식당에서 일해요. 아들이 하나 있고
text.en: I work at a restaurant. I have one son, and he's married and living on his own now.

text.ko: 지금은 결혼해서 따로 살아요. 사실은 저는
text.en: Actually, I'm looking for someone to marry.

text.ko: 결혼할 사람을 찾고 있어요. 아들한테 민폐 끼치고 싶지도 않고
text.en: I don't want to be a burden to my son, and it would be nice to have someone to rely on and live with.

text.ko: 서로 의지하면서 살 사람이 있었으면 좋겠어요.
text.en: I don't want to be a burden to my son, and it would be nice to have someone to rely on and live with.
I don't even have a car.
I live in a modest 24-pyeong villa.

text.ko: 예전에 몇 분 만났는데 다들 안 좋아하시더라고요.
text.en: I met a few people before, but they didn't seem to like it.

text.ko: 재산이 뭐가 중요해요. 마음 편하게 사는 게 중요하죠.
text.en: What's important about wealth? Living with peace of mind is what matters.

text.ko: 근데 제가 정희 씨한테 짐이 될까 봐 그러죠.
text.en: But I'm worried I might be a burden to you, Junghee.
Let's just have a meal today and part ways.
Go ahead and order.
Yes.
Oh, this is too expensive.

text.ko: 아깝게 저희 식당에 가서 드시죠. 제가 해 드릴게요.
text.en: It's a shame. Why don't you come to our restaurant and eat? I'll make it for you.
Yes, that's right.
